reviews.review: She's a nice professor and understanding. So flexible with the deadlines as long as you keep progress in the class. You might feel overwhelmed at the beginning of the class but things will go smoothly once you realize how simple they are.

name: ENGL393Q
title: Technical Writing
description: Prerequisite: Must have fulfilled the Academic Writing (FSAW) requirement. Restriction: Must have earned a minimum of 60 credits. Focuses on the writing of technical papers and reports.
